lines.text: You think this is all my fault? You have brought this on yourself.
All I ever did, Stephanie, was to love Ridge.

And his father, and his brother, and your son-in-law. Is it any wonder Bridget is confused? I mean, is it any wonder your daughter would confuse natural feelings of respect and affection for romance? You have blurred the lines of socially-acceptable behaviour. And you stand here and you tell me you're proud. What are you proud of? Having your son-in-law's baby? I know what you're proud of. Chasing after a man whose wife's body is barely cold in the ground.
We've gone from two insecure, screwed up teenagers to top of the world.

[upon seeing Fabio]
Oh, my Fabio, it's God!
I'm trying to save her the inevitable pain of being married to yet another man who is in love with her mother.
You're a walking, talking, piece of pornography... nothing more.
[attempting to save the hostages single handedly]
When you didn't come back to the hotel Massimo called the Police.
You didn't happen to bring them with you?
Martini with vodka, shaken not stirred, for our Double-O-Seven.
Eh... What?
[Brooke is in labor at Big Bear]
The nurse said there's a doctor who lives around here and they're gonna page him and try to get him to come over.

[to Brooke]
Did you hear that? They're going to page a doctor, so you just have to wait. Hold on.
Oooh, I can't. You're going to have to do it.
What? I'm not- Me? No!
I am not unaware of your charm and your reputation.
Oh, reputation?
How you use women. How you love them, and leave them.
Now where did you hear that?

I know that my daughter can quite easily become infatuated with you, and just as easily end up as one of your discarded conquests. But Caroline is my only daughter, my only child and I desperatley want for her happiness. And I would do everything in power to see to it that she does not get hurt.
Brooke Logan Forrester is nobody's fool, nobody's.
Thank God, Nick... you're back.
Thank God, is it? Well, you'd better pray harder, because he's the only one who's going to help you now.
[opening the door to Brooke]
Whatever you want, I don't have it.

When you named me president, I was so proud, since I thought my hard work paid off. But now I see that family doesn't matter, Ridge isn't even your son! I am. I had it with forgiving and forgetting after the way you let me down today.
Brooke involved me when she started sleeping her way through my family.

[the ownership of Forrester Creations is once again in question, so that lawyers are summoned]
For the love of god, who is running this company?
I am!
I should be.

[handing a box of cookies]
These are "Lauren Fenmore's-Thank You For Saving My Life"-Cookies...

[hesitant]
Did you bake them yourself?
No...
So I can eat them without any fear...
